pr_title: [FLINK-15339][table][docs] Correct the terminology of "Time-windowed Join" to "Interval Join" in Table API & SQL

timeline.message: [FLINK-15339][table][docs] Correct the terminology of "Time-windowed Join" to "Interval Join" in Table API & SQL

timeline.bodyText: What is a interval stream join ?
timeline.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText: In order to distinguish with batch join implementation, because they are located in the same package.
replies.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText: Let's call it ProcTimeIntervalJoin, I will move them into a specific interval package. All the implementations under this package should belong to streaming.
replies.author: wuchong
